title: How to Make McDonald's Oatmeal

steps.headline: Grab a bowl from the dispenser to start everything off in.
Place one cream shot.
steps.description: Using the cream machine or an individual cup place one cream, the one usually used for coffee, inside of the bowl.

steps.headline: Dump the oatmeal in.
steps.description: Select the appropriate package, brown sugar or not depending on what the customer wants, and dump it into the bowl.

steps.headline: Pour hot water over top of the oats.
steps.description: Using hot water from the coffee maker fill the bowl up with hot water. There should be a golden cup, but if your store doesn't have that about a child sized cup will do, or fill it to about halfway to the inside line.

steps.headline: Stir.
steps.description: Using a spoon stir exactly 12 times going from bottom to top. Making sure to scrape the bottom to really mix things in.

steps.headline: Dump the cranberries and raisins in.
Cap and serve.
steps.description: Cap the treat and place it either on drive thru or counter. Include a spoon with the order.
